Emume egwuregwu Lagos (Lagos Games Festival) bu emume egwuregwu na nka otu ụbọchị kwa afọ nke a na-eme na Lagos, Nigeria. Ọ bụ Shina Charles Memud guzobere ya, e kere ya n'ebumnuche nke ịkwalite ọdịbendị ịgba chaa chaa, yana iwulite ohere azụmaahịa maka ụlọ ọrụ ịgba chaa chaa. Emume a na-enye ebe onye ọ bụla nwere ike ịnwale egwuregwu obodo na nke mba ụwa na maka asọmpi, asọmpi na egwu egwu iji rụọ ọrụ
Emume a (LGF) bụ nke ụmụaka na-ahụ n'anya ma na-emeghe nne na nna ma ọ bụ otu ndị mmadụ
E nwere ihe omume n'èzí, ndị na-ere ahịa n'ógbè ahụ, na ndị omenkà iji mee ka ihe omume ahụ kpoo ọkụ.
Ọ bụ DoingSoon mepụtara emume egwuregwu Lagos. Ememe mbụ (2019) nke Lagos Games Festival mere na Tafawa Balewa Square (TBS), Lagos State
